$columns.name: Device Tag Path

custom.parentTagPath: Water Monitoring System/International/North West Pump Station

transforms.code:
#headers = ["Device Tag Path", "Data Type", "Device Value", "Comment"]
	headers = ["Device Tag Path", "Data Type", "Device Value", "Quality"]
	data = []
	
	tag_folder_path = self.custom.parentTagPath
	res = system.tag.browse(tag_folder_path, filter={"recursive":True, "valueSource":"opc", "tagType":"AtomicTag"})
	#tagPaths = [tag['fullPath'] for tag in tags]
	#tagValue = 	[tag['value'] for tag in tags]
	#instances = [{'tagPath': tagPath, 'tagValue': tagValue} for tagPath in tagPaths]
	
	
	for result in res.getResults():
		path = result['fullPath']
		dataType = (result['dataType'])
		deviceValue = str((result['value']).value)
		deviceQuality = str((result['value']).quality)
		#deviceValue =str(system.tag.readBlocking(path)[0].value)
		#deviceValue = str(deviceValue.value)

		data.append([path,dataType, deviceValue, deviceQuality])
		#data.append([result["fullPath"])

	# Finally, both the headers and data lists are used in the function to create a Dataset object
	instances = system.dataset.toDataSet(headers, data)
	
	
	
	return instances

values: Water Monitoring System/International/North West Pump Station

config.script:
import traceback
	
	try:
	
		time = system.date.now()
		time = system.date.format(time, "yyyy-MM-dd HHmmss")
		time = str(time)
		table = self.parent.parent.parent.getSibling("table").getChild("Table").props.data
		csv = system.dataset.toCSV(dataset = table, showHeaders = True, forExport = True)
		system.perspective.print(csv)
		filename = 'Tags' + ' ' + time + '.csv'
		system.perspective.download(filename, csv)
		self.parent.parent.getSibling("Result").props.text = "Tags downloaded to CSV file"
		self.parent.parent.getSibling("Result").props.textStyle.classes = 'Device/Status/Text/On'
		
	except:
		system.perspective.print(traceback.format_exc())
		self.parent.parent.getSibling("Result").props.text = "Cannot download Tags to CSV file"
		self.parent.parent.getSibling("Result").props.textStyle.classes = 'Device/Status/Text/Faulted'
		
	system.perspective.sendMessage('refresh-table')
